altTitles.en: Fist of The North Star Rei Gaiden

altTitles.ja-ro: Soukoku no Garou - Hokuto no Ken Rei Gaiden

altTitles.ja: 蒼黒の餓狼―北斗の拳 レイ外伝―

description.en:
Rei is a ruthless man who travels throughout the world in search of a certain someone. But he was not always ruthless and without compassion–both his search and his anger are driven by vengeance.  
  
The one who stripped Rei's humanity from him is the one Rei must find and destroy, despite any and all barriers. Rei will only become a normal human being once that vengeance is fulfilled. Until that day, he can only roam the world as a furious lone wolf, a lone wolf who preys on those who oppose him.

title.en: Kaoru Hana wa Rin to Saku

altTitles.ja: 薫る花は凛と咲く

altTitles.en: The Fragrant Flower Blooms with Dignity

altTitles.es-la: La fragante flor florece con dignidad

altTitles.th: ดอกรักผลิบานที่กลางใจ

altTitles.vi: Những đóa hoa thơm nở diễm kiều

description.en:
In a certain place, there are two neighboring high schools. Chidori High School, a bottom-feeder boys' school where idiots gather, and Kikyo Girls' School, a well-established girls' school. Rintaro Tsumugi, a strong and quiet second year student at Chidori High School, meets Kaoruko Waguri, a girl who comes as a customer while helping out at his family's cake shop. Rintaro feels comfortable spending time with Kaoruko, but she is a student at Kikyo Girls, a neighboring school that thoroughly dislikes Chidori High.
___
**Links:**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.fr:
Bien qu'ils soient mitoyens, le lycée public Chidori pour garçons et le prestigieux lycée privé pour filles Kikyō continuent à entretenir leur tradition de se haïr mutuellement au plus haut point. Tsumugi Rintarō pensait la même chose, jusqu'à ce qu'il fasse la rencontre de Wakuri Kaoruko, élève de Chidori et habituée de la pâtisserie tenue par ses parents. Malgré la désapprobation et les préjugés de leurs camarades respectifs, Rintarō et Kaoruko vont petit à petit se rapprocher, et tant pis ce qu'en pensent les autres !

___
**Liens :**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.ja:
とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。そこに通う紬 凛太郎と、和栗薫子が出会い…。
“近くて遠い”二人が織りなす、鮮やかな青春彩る学園物語!!

とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。強面で物静かな千鳥高校2年・紬 凛太郎は、実家のケーキ屋の手伝い中にお客として来ていた少女・和栗薫子と出会う。薫子との時間を心地よく感じる凛太郎だったが、彼女は徹底して千鳥を嫌う桔梗女子の生徒で……!?

___
- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.vi: Ở một nơi nào đó, có 2 trường cao trung lân cận. Cao trung Chidori, một trường nam sinh cấp thấp hội tụ đủ những thằng đần, trường nữ sinh Kikyo, một trường nữ sinh danh giá . Rintaro Tsugumi, một nam sinh năm 2 to khỏe và trầm tính tại trường Chidori, bắt gặp Kaoruko Waguri, một khách hàng khi cậu đang giúp việc tại cửa hàng bánh nhà mình . Rintaro cảm thấy thoải mái khi dành thời gian bên Kaoruko, nhưng cô lại là học sinh của trường Kikyo, ngôi trường hàng xóm cực kì căm ghét trường Chidori. Đây là câu chuyện về 2 con người ở rất gần nhưng lại rất xa
description.es-la:
En cierto lugar, hay dos escuelas secundarias vecinas. El instituto Chidori, una escuela masculina de mala muerte en la que se reúnen los idiotas, y el instituto femenino Kikyo, una escuela femenina bien establecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, un fuerte y tranquilo estudiante de segundo curso del instituto Chidori, conoce a Kaoruko Wakuri, una chica que llega como cliente mientras ayuda en la pastelería de su familia. Rintaro se siente cómodo pasando tiempo con Kaoruko, pero ella es alumna de las chicas de Kikyo, una escuela vecina a la que no le gusta nada el instituto Chidori. Esta es la historia de dos personas que están tan cerca y a la vez tan lejos.
___
- [Twitter Oficial (JA)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.pt-br: Em um lugar específico, existem duas escolas secundárias vizinhas. A Escola Secundária Chidori, uma escola para rapazes considerada de nível inferior, onde se reúnem estudantes menos dedicados, e a Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma instituição bem estabelecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, um estudante do segundo ano forte e tranquilo da Escola Secundária Chidori, conhece Kaoruko Waguri, uma garota que aparece como cliente enquanto ajuda na confeitaria da sua família. Rintaro se sente à vontade passando tempo com Kaoruko, mas ela é uma aluna da Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma escola vizinha que tem aversão à Escola Secundária Chidori. Esta é a história de duas pessoas que estão tão próximas e, ao mesmo tempo, tão distantes.

Understanding Karen-chan

description.en:
“You’re amazing for being alive another day!”

A Manga about an understanding girlfriend who rewards you with a “log-in bonus” every day.
description.pt-br:
“Você é incrível por estar vivo mais um dia!”

Um mangá sobre uma namorada compreensiva que recompensa você com um “bônus de login” todos os dias.

title.en: Inaho-kun wa Nise Kanojo no Hazu na no ni

altTitles.ja: 稲穂くんは偽カノジョのはずなのに

altTitles.ja-ro: Inaho-kun Wa Nise Kanojou No Hazu Nanoni

altTitles.en: Inaho-kun Is Supposed to Be a Fake Sweetheart

description.en:
Mori Shintaro, a new first-year student, yearns for the sparkling high school life of having a girlfriend and experiencing youth, but is ridiculed by those around him. His classmate, Inaho Sawatari, entered the school as the top student and is a highly regarded beauty. The two are not supposed to cross paths, but after an incident where they are mistaken for a couple, Inaho makes an unexpected proposal:
"Shall we pretend that we're really dating?"

---
**Notes:**
- The pre-serialization series is [Houkago no Cinderella-kun](https://mangadex.org/title/147b8fd6-5232-45df-993f-35c908cf41a2/houkago-no-cinderella-kun).

title.en: Mezase Gouka Kyakusen!! ~Sen Shokan Skill De Isekai Rich Life Wo Te Ni Irero~

altTitles.ja: めざせ豪華客船!!　～船召喚スキルで異世界リッチライフを手に入れろ～

altTitles.ko: 노려라 호화객선!! 배 소환 스킬로 이세계 부자 라이프를 손에 넣어라

altTitles.en: Striving for the Luxury Liner!! Get that Rich Isekai Life with a Ship Summoning Skill

description.en: After falling into the ocean, Wataru Toyoumi, finds himself reincarnated in another world! Armed with a skill to allow him to summon boats, he plans to get rich and live a happy life aboard his very own luxury liner.

The downfall of a noble family. And a girl who risks her life seeking revenge.

“Lady Ayana.”

There was a knight who had been by her side for thirteen years. The person who came to her mind before her own family was going to be annihilated. He risked his life for her, suffered wounds, hunger, and gave her everything. Now, he is looking at her while she’s waiting for her execution with a joyful smile.

“Please show me another enjoyable story this time, my lady.”

The devil smiled and extended his hand, and the girl took it.

“I hope you get the ending you desire in the next story, my lady.”

(Source: Kakao, translated)
description.es: Ella tuvo que pasar por la aniquilación de su familia, él llegó al final de su vida para darle la oportunidad de vengarse. “Aiana.” El caballero que estuvo a mi lado durante 13 años, arriesgó su vida, sufrió, pasó hambre y lo dio todo por mí. Pero ahora, al presentarse mi muerte inminente, sonreía felizmente mientras contemplaba mi desceso. “Por favor, ten una historia agradable esta vez, mi señora”. El demonio sonrió y me tendió la mano. “Espero que en la próxima historia obtengas el final que deseas”

altTitles.ja: 半人前の恋人

altTitles.en: Blooming Love

altTitles.th: มือใหม่หัดรัก

altTitles.en: Half Serving Lover

description.en: One day, when I was making school supplies in the art room, a very scary-looking girl was staring at me…!? Crafts girl vs. art boy romantic comedy!!
description.ru: В один прекрасный день Ибуки Синтаро поручили сделать ящик для предложений только потому, что он состоит в художественном кружке. Пока он работал с непривычными для него инструментами, он заметил на себе сверлящий взгляд устрашающей девчонки. Неожиданно она забирает у него пилу и энергичными движениями начинает резать доску! Так начинаются отношения между мальчишкой-художником и девчонкой-мастерицей!
description.th: “ในวันหนึ่ง ขณะที่กำลังทำงานอุปกรณ์ในห้องศิลปะ มีเด็กสาวที่มีหน้าตาน่ากลัวกำลังเฝ้ามองมาที่ผม...!?” เรื่องราวความรักคอมเมดี้ระหว่างสาวช่างฝีมือกับหนุ่มสายศิลป์!?
description.pt-br:
Um dia, quando eu estava fazendo material escolar na sala de arte, uma garota muito assustadora estava olhando para mim...!? 

Menina do artesanato vs. garoto da arte comédia romântica!!

altTitles.ja: 真夜中ハートチューン

altTitles.en: Finding the girl behind the voice.
Midnight Heart Tune

altTitles.pt-br: Sintonizando com o Coração da Meia Noite
Em busca da garota por trás da voz

description.en:
***"Late at night, alone on my bed, your voice was the only thing that saved me. I want to talk to you again. There's something I want to say."***

Without knowing her real name or face, Yamabuki Arisu, a second-year high school student, was looking for a girl named "Apollo'' who was a livestreamer. However, one day, Arisu gets a clue about Apollo from the broadcast club of the high school where she is going. There were 4 beautiful girls who dreamed of "getting a job related to voice"!! Who is Apollo? What will happen to the dreams of the four people? A cute yet hard-working success romantic comedy begins here!!

---
**Links:**
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10568/episode/347385) (U.S. Only)
description.ja:
***「深夜ひとり、ベッドの上、キミの声だけが救いだった。もう一度キミと話したい。言いたいことがあるんだ」。***

高校2年生の山吹有栖は、「アポロ」という名の、顔も本名も知らないラジオ配信者の少女を探していた。だがある日、有栖は進学先の高校の放送部にアポロの手がかりを得る。そこにいたのは「声に関わる仕事に就く」夢を描く美少女が…4人!!アポロは誰？4人の夢の行方は？かわいくも懸命なサクセスラブコメ、ここに開演!!
description.ru:
«Пока я лежал на кровати посреди ночи в полном одиночестве, твой голос был моим единственным утешением. Я хочу поговорить с тобой ещё раз. И должен кое-что тебе сказать».

Ямабуки Арису, ученик второго класса старшей школы, ищет бывшую ведущую радио-стримов «Аполло», не зная ни её лица, ни имени. Однако, однажды он понимает, что Аполло скрывается среди участниц клуба радиовещания в его школе. Четыре красавицы оттуда мечтают получить работу, связанную с голосом. Но которая из них — Аполло? И что станет с их мечтами? Милый ромком о тяжёлом труде и успехе начинается!
description.pt-br: Yamabuki Arisu, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, estava procurando por uma garota chamada “Apollo”, que era locutora de rádio e ele não conhecia seu rosto ou seu nome verdadeiro. No entanto, um dia, Arisu recebe uma pista sobre Apollo do clube de transmissão da escola secundária para a qual ela estava indo. Havia quatro belas garotas que sonhavam em “conseguir um emprego relacionado à voz”!! Quem é Apollo? O que acontecerá com os sonhos dessas quatro pessoas? Uma comédia romântica fofa, mas trabalhadora e de sucesso, começa aqui!!

title.en: Kuroiwa Medaka ni Watashi no Kawaii ga Tsuujinai

altTitles.en: Medaka Kuroiwa is Impervious to My Charms
My Charms Are Wasted on Medaka Kuroiwa

altTitles.ja: 黒岩メダカに私の可愛いが通じない

altTitles.ru: Куроива Мэдака не понимает моей привлекательности

altTitles.es-la: Mis encantos no funcionan con Kuroiwa Medaka

altTitles.zh: 我的可爱对黑岩目高不管用

description.en:
Kuroiwa Medaka was born in a temple and is currently a monk in training. Because of his temple's rules, he can't interact with girls - and what's more, he doesn't even know how to regularly socialize with them. Mona, the "queen bee" of the school, however insistently tries to make him fall in love with her, but he always ignores her in order to maintain the rules of his temple.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10032/episode/312982) (U.S. Only)
description.fr:
Tu ne le sais pas encore, mais tu m’adores !

Mona plaît à tout le monde, c’est comme ça. Son sourire, son allure, sa personnalité… Tout chez elle attire les gens. Dans son lycée, elle fait tourner toutes les têtes. Sauf celle d’un garçon… Medaka. Fraîchement admis dans son école, celui-ci a complètement chamboulé la vie de cette fille à qui nul ni personne n’est censé résister. C’est bien simple : Medaka refuse de la regarder ou se renfrogne à la moindre de ses tentatives de rapprochement. Devant cette insulte à son charme ravageur, Mona décide de tout mettre en œuvre pour le séduire, quitte à se mettre dans des situations où elle-même ne saura plus quoi ressentir ! La tombeuse VS l’insensible : qui craquera en premier ? 

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Pika**
description.ja:
オチないアイツに、最強モテ女が大奮闘！「アイツのことなんて、ぜんっぜん好きじゃないないのに！！」

容姿端麗！ スタイル抜群！ 川井モナは、息をするようにモテる女!!　しかし、そんな彼女に見向きもしない転校生・黒岩メダカの登場で、モナの学校生活は一変する！　「今までずっと、チヤホヤされて生きてきたのに!!」あの手この手でメダカをオトそうと大奮闘！　時にはちょっぴりカゲキなことも!?　
モテ女子×禁欲男子のラブコメディ、大勃発――!!
description.ru: Куроива Мэдака родился в храме и в настоящее время является монахом, проходящим обучение. Из-за правил своего храма он не может общаться с девушками и более того, он даже не знает, как с ними общаться. Мона, "королева пчёл" школы, однако настойчиво пытается заставить его влюбиться в неё, но он всегда игнорирует её, чтобы сохранить правила своего храма.
description.es-la:
La mujer más popular del mundo lucha contra un tipo que no le gusta. ¡Ni siquiera me gusta en absoluto!

¡Buena apariencia! Estilo excepcional! ¡Kawai Mona es una mujer impresionante! Sin embargo, con la aparición de un estudiante transferido, Kuroiwa Medaka, que ni siquiera la mira, ¡la vida escolar de Mona cambiará por completo! "  Ella se ha pasado toda su vida siendo consentida y ha hecho todo lo posible por ganarse a Medaka que aveces pueder un poco radical.

¡La comedia romantica de una chica popular y un chico abstinente está a punto de estallar!
description.pt-br: Kuroiwa nasceu em um templo e atualmente é um monge em treinamento. Por causa das regras do seu templo, ele não pode interagir com garotas - e mais, nem mesmo sabe como fazer isso. Mona, a "abelha rainha" da escola, insistentemente tenta fazê-lo se apaixonar por ela, mas ele sempre a ignora a fim de se manter íntegro quanto as regras do seu templo.

altTitles.en: I Want to Marry the Demon Queen
I Want to Marry the Devil

altTitles.es: Quiero casarme con una reina demonio

altTitles.ja: 魔王様と結婚したい

altTitles.uk: Я хочу одружитися з королевою демонів

description.en:
One day, the Demon Queen saves Haru, a young human boy about to be sold as a slave, and takes him back to be her attendant. Some years later, the bored demon queen asks our now fully grown and handsome Haru what else she has left to do.

"Marriage," Haru replies.

Thus, a heart-pounding romcom between an innocent demon queen and her servant unfolds.
description.uk: Одного разу Королева демонів врятувала Хару, молодого людського хлопця, якого збиралися продати в рабство, і забрала його до себе, щоб він став її слугою. Через кілька років нудьгуюча королева демонів запитує тепер уже дорослого і вродливого Хару, що ще їй залишилося зробити. "Вийти заміж", - відповідає Хару. Так розгортається несамовитий ромком між невинною королевою демонів та її слугою.
description.pt-br: Um dia, a rainha demônio salva Haru, um garoto humano que estava prestes a ser vendido como um escravo, e o traz de volta como seu atendente. Anos depois, a entediada rainha demônio pergunta para um crescido Haru o que mais ela pode fazer. Se casar, Haru responde. E então, uma comedia romântica de fazer o coração bater mais rápido começa entre um demônio inocente e seu servo.

altTitles.en: Windbreaker
Wind Breaker (Nii Satoru)

altTitles.ja: ウィンドブレイカー

description.en: Haruka Sakura wants nothing to do with weaklings—he's only interested in the strongest of the strong. He's just started at Furin High School, a school of degenerates known only for their brawling strength—strength they use to protect their town from anyone who wishes it ill. But Haruka's not interested in being a hero or being part of any sort of team—he just wants to fight his way to the top!
description.fr:
Haruka Sakura est le genre de lycéen qui fait passer la baston avant les révisions. Fraîchement débarqué en ville, c'est donc le sourire aux lèvres qu'il compte pousser les portes du lycée Fûrin, l'établissement scolaire au pire taux de délinquance du pays... Les intentions de Haruka sont claires : se mesurer aux meilleurs bagarreurs de ce bahut et devenir le meilleur de tous ! Mais entre-temps, il se retrouve mêlé à une altercation avec une bande de brutes dans un des quartiers de la ville, avant d'être sauvé in extremis par des élèves de son lycée. Haruka réalise alors à quel genre de phénomènes il risque d'avoir affaire...

Maison d'édition FR : Pika
description.ja: 彼らは、最強の不良軍団。そして、街の英雄───。偏差値は最底辺、喧嘩は最強。超不良校として名高い学校・風鈴（ふうりん）高校。この春、そんな風鈴のトップを目指して街にやってきた風鈴高校１年生・桜遥（さくらはるか）は、風鈴高校が“防風鈴（ボウフウリン）”と名付けられた街を守る集団となっていたことを知る。そして桜は、風鈴の一員として街を守るため戦い始めることに──！　不良高校生・桜の喧嘩英雄伝説、開幕!!
description.pt-br: A Fûrin High School ganhou a pior reputação entre as escolas da região por ter a média mais baixa e os alunos mais rebeldes. E nela ingressa Haruka Sakura, um jovem que acaba de chegar na cidade, que busca ser o mais forte para poder proteger todos com quem se importa. Para atingir seu objetivo, porém, a primeira coisa que ele deve fazer é se juntar a uma gangue chamada Wind Breaker, que representa seu instituto e cujo objetivo é defender a cidade de outras gangues e bandidos. No entanto, para que eles o aceitem, ele terá que ganhar o respeito deles com os punhos!

altTitles.en: Hunter Hunter
HUNTER×HUNTER
HxH

altTitles.ja: ハンター×ハンター

description.en: Hunters are a special breed, dedicated to tracking down treasures, magical beasts, and even other men. But such pursuits require a license, and less than one in a hundred thousand can pass the grueling qualification exam. Those who do pass gain access to restricted areas, amazing stores of information, and the right to call themselves Hunters.
description.fa:
هانتر‌ها، افراد کنجکاوی که به دنبال گنج‌ها، مجرم‌های خطرناک، مکان‌های ناشناخته و اسرارآمیز، جانوران افسانه‌ای و... هستند. البته برای دست یابی به این موقعیت نیاز به مجوزی است که در بین هر صدهزار نفر تنها یک نفر می‌تواند در آزمون آن موفق شود.
این داستان درمورد چهار نوجوانه که در آزمون هانترها با هم روبه‌رو می‌شوند:
گون، پسری که به دنبال پدرش می‌گردد. کیلوا، پسری که می‌خواهد زندگی جدیدی را شروع کند. لئوریو، پسری که قصد دارد پزشک شود و کوراپیکا، پسری که می‌خواهد انتقام قبیله خود‌ را بگیرد.
description.pt: Hunters são uma raça especial, dedicada a rastrear tesouros, animais mágicos, e até mesmo outros homens. Mas tais atividades requerem uma licença, e menos de um em cem mil pode passar no exame de qualificação esgotante. Aqueles que não passam tem acesso a áreas restritas, lojas de incríveis informações, bem como o direito de chamar-se de Hunters.
description.es-la: Sigue la historia de Gon Freecss, un joven que descubre que su padre, a quien creía muerto, es un legendario Cazador, un miembro de una élite que se especializa en localizar tesoros, bestias raras o personas peligrosas. Decidido a encontrar a su padre, Gon emprende un viaje para convertirse en Cazador. En su camino, se enfrenta a desafíos mortales y forma fuertes lazos con amigos como Killua, Leorio y Kurapika. A medida que avanza en su viaje, Gon descubre que el mundo de los Cazadores es mucho más peligroso y complejo de lo que imaginaba.
description.pt-br:
A série conta a história de Gon Freecss, um garoto de 12 anos que pretende se tornar um Hunter, um caçador de tesouros, lugares perdidos e criaturas estranhas.

Contudo, ao contrário da maioria dos Hunters que procuram fama e dinheiro, o herói da história tem uma motivação maior para querer ser um caçador – encontrar seu pai – um dos mais famosos hunters do mundo.

Mas não é qualquer um que pode se tornar um Hunter. Para poder praticar essa reconhecida profissão, é necessário ter uma licença especial – e para tirá-la é preciso passar – e sobreviver – a exames com milhares de inscritos. Uma vez aprovado e com sua licença Hunter em mãos, o caçador passa a ter direito a acessar áreas restritas, informações secretas e consegue acumular facilmente uma grande fortuna de acordo com seus feitos ? incluindo ir atrás de Hunters que usam seus poderes para objetivos escusos.

altTitles.ja: 逃がさないよ？ 袋路くん

altTitles.en: You won't escape, Fukuroji-kun

description.en:
The story revolves around Fukuroji, a high school boy who tries to live in the shadows.

However, his life takes an unexpected turn when, as part of a punishment game, he has to confess his love to the most popular girl in his class. Through a misunderstanding, he ends up confessing his feelings to Tsubaki Sakura, the most feared girl in school.

As he tries to clear up the confusion, Tsubaki surprisingly attacks him, adding an unexpected and hilarious twist to the situation.
description.ja:
**エッチな捕食者たちからは逃げられない!? 草食男子の泥沼性春ラブコメディー**

目立たないように日々を過ごしている男子高校生・袋路は、ある日、罰ゲームでクラスのアイドルに告白することに。しかし、彼は学園で最も恐れられている強面女子・椿さくらに間違えて告白してしまう。誤解を解こうと袋路は、二人きりで椿に説明しようとするが、いきなり彼女は制服を脱ぎだして…!?

altTitles.en: Please Marry Me With Divorce in Mind

altTitles.ja: 結婚しよう。離婚前提で。

description.en:
After turning 30 as a NEET, Kyousuke was kicked out of his parents' house. 
That's when Rui, his closest friend, proposes a solution: to get married, then divorce!


A guy and girl who've been 'just friends' for around a decade decide to enter a pretend marriage.
He's a romantic and she's just a pragmatic girl.  A pair unsuited for marriage.
What will they discover after 100 days together?
description.pt-br:
Depois de completar 30 anos como NEET, Kyousuke foi expulso da casa de seus pais.
Foi então que Rui, o seu melhor amigo, propôs uma solução: casar e depois divorciar-se!

Um rapaz e uma moça que são “apenas amigos” há cerca de uma década decidem entrar em um casamento de mentira.
Ele é um romântico e ela é apenas uma garota pragmática. Um casal inadequado para o casamento.
O que eles descobrirão depois de 100 dias juntos?

title.en: I Tried to Live a Good Life

altTitles.en: I Tried to Live Nicely

description.en:
After my grandmother's funeral, I woke up in the body of a noblewoman. Specifically, a woman who had died because she didn’t want to get married.

The older brother of the man she was supposed to marry comes to me, threatening to pay off her debts, and my father is absolutely no help at all.
On top of that, the shop is about to disappear, and the estate is falling apart.
Just yesterday, I was a modern person finding small joys like sneaking a coffee from the break room or charging my phone at the office, but now I have to pay off debts and manage an estate.
I tried to live a good life, just as the god had said when he gave me this chance…
"I wonder if selling a few loaves of bread will really help you pay it back."
"Don't worry, I'll pay it off."
"If such a miracle happens."
He turned to me, standing slightly askew with his arms crossed over his chest. Even in his anger, he looked astonishingly handsome.
"If that miracle occurs, I'll kneel before you and kiss the top of your foot."

title.en: Unrequited Love Doesn’t End With Marriage

altTitles.en: Unrequited Love Does Not End in Marriage

altTitles.es-la: El Amor Desigual No Resulta en Matrimonio

description.en: The moment Duke Argus saved her, a refugee, Miel became a sunflower. And it’s been eight years since she earnestly buried that feeling in her heart… “Marry me.” The lord said to her, now a capable officer. “You seem to be the most steadfast.”

altTitles.en: So Let’s Start Being a Family Again
We Were Living Apart, so Let’s Start My Family Again

altTitles.ja: ウチは別れて暮らしてる

altTitles.en: We Were Living Apart, So Let's Start Being a Family Again

altTitles.pt-br: Então Vamos Começar a Ser uma Família Novamente

description.en:
I met my divorced wife again after several years. 

Like Takefumi always says to himself, “She’s a stranger now.” Even though his ex-wife, Chitose, has become more attractive than ever. One day when he accidentally goes out for a drink with her, and thinks he wants to spend a little more time with her tonight, he discovers a terrible truth.

My ex-wife now has a child, and it’s mine.

A great love comedy that begins after a divorce!
description.pt-br:
Encontrei minha esposa divorciada novamente depois de vários anos. 

Como Takefumi sempre diz para si mesmo: "Ela é uma estranha agora." Mesmo que sua ex-mulher, Chitose, tenha se tornado mais atraente do que nunca. Um dia, quando acidentalmente sai para tomar um drinque com ela e pensa que quer ficar um pouco mais com ela esta noite, ele descobre uma terrível verdade. 

Minha ex-mulher agora tem uma filha e é meu.

Uma grande comédia de amor que começa após um divórcio!

altTitles.en: May Your Soul Rest in Magdala

altTitles.es: Que tu alma descanse en Magdala

altTitles.ja: マグダラで眠れ

description.en:
From the writer of Spice & Wolf comes another fantasy adventure. An alchemist facing a death sentence is placed under the watchful eye of a representative of the Knights.

It is a world where order is maintained by three great factions, the Church which bears the greatest authority, the Order of Clausius possessing influence on par with the Church, immense assets and military might, and lastly the Guild of Commerce, an association of merchants and artisans alike.
The alchemist Kusler who was captured and imprisoned because he committed the offense of trying to burn a saint's bones, sold his skills and talents to the Order of Clausius. Together with an old friend, Welland, they were then dispatched towards the town of Grubetti which was close to the front lines.
And then at a workshop in Grubetti which boasted advanced equipment due to being near the front lines, Kusler met the devout nun Urle Fenesis who had introduced herself as a "watchdog."

altTitles.en: Eromanga-sensei

altTitles.th: น้องสาวของผมคืออาจารย์เอโรมังกะ

altTitles.ja: エロマンガ先生

description.en:
Writing light novels isn't all that easy, especially when you're in high school and you have to do the cooking and the chores for your shut-in stepsister who's hardly come out of her room the past year! In the light novel business, it's crucial to have the right person illustrating your books to help them sell–and maybe get made into manga and anime! But in a world of online pen names, the author and the illustrator may still not even know each other . . . until one day they realize they've been living in the same house all along! Now the home life of confident writer Masamune Izumi and his reclusive sister Sagiri–aka the artist ''Eromanga Sensei''–will be a drama to compare with their rising careers, their restive fan base, and their rivals in the industry!  


---
[See AnimeNewsNetwork for the anime.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=18142)
description.ru: История вращается вокруг Масамунэ Изуми, ученика вуза и, по совместительству, автора лайт-новел. У Масамунэ есть сестра по имени Сагири, та ещё хикикомори, которая не выходила из своей комнаты в течение целого года. Она даже заставляет своего брата, готовить и приносить ей еду, топая ногой по полу. Поэтому Масамунэ хочет, чтобы его сестра вышла из комнаты, ведь они — семья как-никак.

altTitles.th: อากิ โซระ

altTitles.ja: あきそら

description.en:
Aki Sora revolves around Aki Aoi and Sora Aoi, a pair of close siblings who have shared an intimate bond since childhood. During their coming of age, they each come to realize the true depth of the love they feel for each other and consummate that love in secret. They keep their younger sister, Nami, Sora’s twin in the dark about their new relationship. Nami, clueless of what is happening in her household aims to set her brother up with her best friend, Kana Sumiya. Despite these relationships Nami seems to have feelings for someone near to her too but keeps them secret.  
  
See [AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=11150) for the OAV.  
See [AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=11525) for Yume no Naka (OAV sequel).

title.en: Shin Megami Tensei IV Dengeki Comic Anthology

altTitles.ja: 真・女神転生IV 電撃コミックアンソロジー

description.en: Anthology of shorts based on Shin Megami Tensei IV.

title.en: A Thousand Ways For Her to Take Revenge

description.en:
' My fiancé who betrayed me, my family who stole everything from me...'

I swore that I would never forgive them even in death. I cursed myself to the point of breaking apart. Did that wish come true? "Lilith, wake up! you have to get ready to leave!" i travelled back in time before my parents passed away!

"Who are you?" "My name is Lilith." I won't repeat my mistakes in this life. Those who trampled on me and belittle me in my past life... I will make them all pay. because now, I'm the one in charge.

altTitles.en: Inertia 67 Percent

altTitles.ja: 惰性67%
惰性67パーセント

description.en: This comedy manga takes place in the room of a college girl named Yoshizawa. Her friends, Itou, Kitahara, and Nishida often stop by, and they run into funny adult-level problems. For instance, there is the day when her friends drop by while Yoshizawa's hungover in bed, and she suddenly realizes that she doesn't have on any underwear under the covers. Yoshizawa also has unusual problems, like her need for advice on drawing realistic penises in her manga, since she's never encountered one in real life before. There are a lot of quirky things that can happen in a college girl's home!
description.pl: Dasei 67% (Inertia 67%) to urokliwa komedia znanego twórcy hentaiów, opowiadająca perypetie czwórki studentów sztuki i ich beztroskich spotkań w mieszkaniu jednej z bohaterek. Manga często porusza erotyczne tematy, takie jak na przykład sztuka rysowania genitaliów.
description.ru: Минами Ёсидзава, студентка отделения живописи художественного университета, живет в квартире, куда к ней постоянно приходят потусоваться ее друзья. Пусть она и живёт не совсем полноценной жизнью, но ее рутинные будни, словно протекающие по инерции, могут оказаться довольно забавными. Слегка пикантная, слегка замороченная комедия о буднях студентки университета и ее друзей.

description.en: Hwa Gok is just a normal university student, until he sees a girl being attacked by the popular Lee Bin, and jumps in her defence. The only problem is that Lee Bin is more than meets the eye…
description.es: Un humano, un licántropo o un vampiro, ¡¿qué soy?! Completamente ignorante de la existencia de estos depredadores, Hwa Gok sigue con su vida cotidiana… Es decir, hasta que Lee Bin le da la vuelta a su vida mordiéndole en el cuello, provocando un torbellino de eventos que ninguno de ellos podía prever.

description.en:
Two lonely persons, two different fates. Him, a weak guy that suffers from albinism and permanent near-sighted. Her, an unwanted child, ostracized at school because she doesn't speak Vietnamese... In a twisted fate, they found themselves connected through Wi-Fi Network Names, but will their relationship last?

Omake arts done by [Flygombal](https://www.fiverr.com/zamrutzh)
Cover arts done by [Artiya](https://www.fiverr.com/kazisain)
description.vi: 2 con người F.A, 2 hoàn cảnh số phận hoàn toàn khác biệt. Thế mà chỉ vì tình cờ "giao tiếp" qua cái tên Wi-Fi ngẫu nhiên mà đến với nhau?

title.en: Danshi Koukousei, Otome Game no Akuyaku Reijou ni Tensei Suru.

altTitles.ja: 男子高校生、乙女ゲームの悪役令嬢に転生する。

altTitles.en: A High School Boy Reincarnates as the Villainous Daughter in an Otome Game.

description.en:
One day, "I," an ordinary high school boy living in the present day, was hit by a truck and reincarnated in another world. But what a surprise it was to find out that I was reincarnated as Elena Evan, the "villainess" of an otome game!

If this continues, the future that awaits me will either be condemnation, execution, or exile... I want to avoid that at all costs. While I was worrying about this, I found a glimmer of hope. If Tiara, the main heroine, and I could get together and find a yuri route for us, maybe we could avoid a bad ending...?

However, I am now beset by a number of beautiful and handsome men...?
description.ja:
現代に生きるごく普通の男子高校生である「俺」は、ある日トラックに轢かれて異世界に転生してしまう。しかし、転生した先はなんと乙女ゲームの「悪役令嬢」エレナ・エヴァンだった――！

このままだと待つ未来は、断罪・死刑・国外追放……。それだけはなんとしても阻止したい。悩んだ俺はひとつの光を見出す。正ヒロインのティアラと俺が結ばれて百合ルートになれば、バッドエンドを回避できるんじゃないか…!?

しかし、そんな俺の前に立ちはだかるのは見目麗しい数々のイケメンたちで――!?

altTitles.ja: ゴーアンゴー

description.en: Eigo Nitta, new student in Hoyo high school, is enrolled in the baseball team. Talented as fast pitcher but lacking in term of technique, Eigo Nitta aims to be the new pitcher of the team. He has to face many opponents, which creates an atmosphere of competition in the baseball team. However he and his teammates will have to find a way to solve the rivalry among the baseball team in order to go to Koshien tournament.

altTitles.ja: 特別な中途半端

altTitles.en: Special Halves

description.en:
"What does it mean to be dating exactly...?"

They're not friends.
But they're also not lovers.
It's a story about these two's half-relationship.

title.en: Isshou Watashi no Joshu de ite!

altTitles.ja: 一生わたしの助手でいて！

altTitles.en: Be my assistant for life!

description.en:
"The relationship between a detective and their assistant is not unlike romance!"

Due to his natural tendency to assist others (a "helper type" personality that makes him constantly want to lend a hand), Mitomo Tasuku had always lived in the shadows. To break out of this, he made it his life's mission to "become number one." However, at the high school he transfers to, he encounters three detective girls, who happen to be his rivals from elementary school with whom he formed a detective club together. Thus begins Tasuku's fierce battle for the top detective spot! However... these girls seem to harbor passionate feelings of a different kind...!?

altTitles.ja: ペルソナ4 電撃コミックアンソロジー

description.en: Anthology of shorts based on Persona 4.

altTitles.zh-ro: You Bei Houbei Xia Ke Shang
Yòu Bèi Hòubèi Xià Kè Shàng

altTitles.en: I've Been Defeated by The Younger Generation Again
I Was Beaten Down By The Younger Generation Again

description.en: Lu Meihe, the art team leader who is called "Cobra" by her subordinates, is a person with a strict appearance and a pure heart. She has a crush on Lin Wenjing, an intern in the group, but due to her image and personality, she cannot express her friendship naturally, so she can only pin her emotions on the sketchbook she carries with her. In an accident, the secret of the sketchbook was discovered by the person concerned. Only then did Lu Meihe know that Lin Wenjing, who seemed gentle and easy-going, seemed to be not a quiet queen... I was bullied by the junior again today, so happy, what should I do?
description.zh: 被下属称呼为“眼镜蛇”的美术组长吕美合是个外表严苛内心纯情的人。她暗恋组内实习生林文静，然而碍于形象和人设，无法自然地表达自己的情谊，只能将自己的情感寄托于随身携带的素描本。 一次意外，素描本的秘密被当事人发现，吕美合才知道，看似温柔随性的林文静，似乎人后性格不文静啊…… 今天又被后辈欺负了，太幸福了，怎么办？

title.en: Seichou Cheat de Nandemo Dekiru you ni Natta ga, Mushoku dake wa Yamerarenai you desu

altTitles.ja: 成長チートでなんでもできるようになったが、無職だけは辞められないようです

altTitles.en: I've Become Able to Do Anything with My Growth Cheat, but I Can't Seem to Get out of Being Jobless

altTitles.ko: 성장 치트로 뭐든 할 수 있게 되었지만, 무직만큼은 그만둘 수가 없습니다

altTitles.zh: 只有无职是不会辞去的

altTitles.zh-hk: 只有無職是不會辭去的

description.en:
I, Ichinosuke, failed to get a job 100 times in a row. In fact, my lifelong unemployment streak remains unbroken.

On my way to yet another job interview, I was involved in an accident with a truck and tragically passed away. Suddenly, a goddess bestowed upon me the ability to grow at a speed 20 times faster than normal… and another goddess, making a mistake, bestowed upon me the ability to grow at a speed 20 times faster than normal, before sending me to a game-like other world.

Wait, 20 times 20…. 400 times faster than normal?!

However, knowing that I would not become stronger even if I continued growing while being jobless, I aimed to get a job… but I discovered that remaining Jobless was a cheat in and of itself, provided you can stomach the slow leveling process. … Which I do at 400 times faster than normal.

As my Growth Cheat and Jobless Cheat existed side-by-side in this other world, the story of my adventure, no doubt certified by the job-placement agency as harmful material, begins here.
description.ja: 就活中に事故で死にそうになった楠一之丞は異世界に転移。さらに女神の手違いにより一之丞は常人の400倍のスピードで成長する能力を授かった。あまりの成長速度に、一之丞は無職のまま異世界生活を始める。

altTitles.pt-br: A Reencarnação do Vagabundo: Vou dar meu melhor se for para outro mundo

altTitles.en: Jobless Reincarnation - I Will Go All Out When I'm Transported to Another World
Jobless Reincarnation - It Will be All Out if I Go to Another World
Mr. No-Job's New Life - If I Go to a Parallel World, Then I'll Get Serious

altTitles.fr: Mushoku Tensei - Nouvelle vie, nouvelle chance

altTitles.en: Mushoku Tensei: If I Get to a Parallel Universe I'll Bring Out my True Effort
Mushoku Tensei: Jobless Reincarnation

altTitles.ru: Реинкарнация безработного ~История о приключениях в другом мире~
Реинкарнация безработного: Попав в другой мир, я стану сёръёзнее

altTitles.th: เกิดชาตินี้พี่ต้องเทพ

altTitles.zh: 无职转生~在异世界认真地活下去~

altTitles.ja: 無職転生 〜異世界行ったら本気だす〜

altTitles.de: Mushoku Tensei - In dieser Welt mach ich alles anders

altTitles.zh-hk: 無職轉生~在異世界認真地活下去~

altTitles.pt-br: Jobless Reincarnation: I Will Seriously Try If I Go to Another World

altTitles.ms: Penjelmaan Semula yang Menganggur: Jika Saya Pergi ke Dunia Lain, Saya Akan Menjadi Serius

altTitles.it: Reincarnazione senza lavoro: Ci proverò seriamente se vado in un altro mondo

altTitles.fr: Réincarnation sans emploi : j'essaierai sérieusement si je vais dans un autre monde

altTitles.vi: Thất nghiệp chuyển sinh ~ Sống hết mình sau khi tới thế giới khác~

altTitles.ru: Реинкарнация безработного: Я серьёзно постараюсь, если отправлюсь в другой мир

altTitles.tr: Mushoku Tensei: Paralel Evrene Taşındığımda Her Şeyi Yapacağım

description.en: A 34-year-old NEET gets killed in a traffic accident and finds himself in a world of magic. Rather than waking up as a full-grown mage, he gets reincarnated as a newborn baby, retaining the memories of his past life. Before he can even properly move his body, he resolves to never make the same mistakes he made in his first life ever again and instead live a life with no regrets with the new one that was given to him. Because he has the knowledge of a middle-aged man, by the age of two, he has already become a prodigy and possesses power unthinkable for anyone his age and even older. Thus begins the chronicles of Rudeus Greyrat, son of swordsman Paul and healer Zenith, as he enters a new world to become the strongest mage known to man, with powers rivaling even the gods themselves.
description.ru:
34-летнего отаку-затворника выгнали из дома родственники после похорон его родителей. Этот жирный и уродливый девственник без гроша в кармане осознал, что его жизнь подошла к концу. Затем он понял, что его жизнь вообще могла бы быть намного лучше, если бы тот мог избавиться от тёмных страниц своей жизни. Пребывая в сожалениях, мужчина увидел, как грузовик со спящим водителем быстро надвигается на трёх школьников. Собрав все свои силы, он попытался спасти их и погиб.  
  
А открыв глаза, он обнаружил, что переродился в мире меча и магии как Рудеус Грейрат. Получив в этом мире новую жизнь, Рудеус решил, что в этот раз проживёт свою жизнь на полную, безо всяких сожалений!  
  
И так началось приключение человека, пожелавшего заново начать свою жизнь.  
  
Alternative Raw: <http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/23831>
description.es-la: La historia trata sobre un muchacho que se encierra en su casa tras sufrir una enorme humillación pública sin atreverse a salir durante varios años debido a los traumas que esto le ocasionó. Incapaz de soportar esto, se encerró en casa sin querer salir ni volver a ver a sus compañeros y durante años el miedo a salir creció y creció, acabando por convertirse en una carga para su familia… hasta el día en que sus padres murieron y sus hermanos lo expulsaron de su hogar por el parásito en el que se había convertido. En ese momento, aunque tarde, se arrepintió de su actitud y se puso a pensar que su vida podría haber sido decente si él le hubiera puesto más esfuerzo. Justo cuando estaba a punto de iniciar su nuevo cambio, ve un camión en movimiento a gran velocidad dirigiéndose a tres estudiantes de secundaria. Reuniendo todas las fuerzas que tenía logra salvarlos, pero a cambio él termina siendo atropellado por el camión, muriendo al instante. Cuando abrió los ojos, él había reencarnado en un mundo de espadas y magia como Rudeus Greyrat. Nacido en este nuevo mundo, con una nueva vida, Rudeus decidió que, “Esta vez, realmente voy a vivir mi vida al máximo sin arrepentimientos”. De este modo se inicia el viaje de un hombre que anhela reiniciar su vida.

altTitles.ja: アイドル×アイドル　ストーリー！

altTitles.en: Idol x Idol Story!

description.en:
Mimi Nagisa (22 years old) is a former idol. After giving up on her dream of being an idol because of her lacking talent she spends her days working part-time while attending college. However, the moment she meets the idol Ibuki Nanakusa, whom she recently found interest in, their lives begin to cross each other.

(Source: Comic Fuz, translated)

[Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/idol2story_info)
description.ja: 才能がないと夢を諦めた元アイドルのミミと、ミミに憧れていた現役アイドル・イブキ。そんな2人が、ひょんな出会いから一緒にサバイバルオーディション番組への出演を目指すことに…!?　一度は諦めかけた夢、今度こそ2人でなら…！
description.ru: Мими Нагиса (22 года) — бывший айдол. После того, как она отказалась от своей мечты стать айдолом из-за отсутствия таланта, она проводит дни работая на неполный рабочий день, учась в колледже. Однако в тот момент, когда она встречает кумира Ибуки Нанакуса, к которому она недавно проявляла интерес, их жизни начинают пересекаться.

title.en: You, the One Sitting Next to Me, Are the Cutest.

description.en:
Enter Hoshikawa Yuu, a boy cute enough that people mistake him for a girl, and Kohinata Akari, a classmate of his who recently moved her seat next to him.  
  
This is a story about the two high school students sitting next to one another, and who each think that the other is the cutest one around.

altTitles.en: Miss Miracle

description.en:
Scaredy-cat? Wastrel? I’ll blind your eyes! I, Ling Hu Qing Xue, am a top-class bounty hunter. In an incident, I traversed into Ancient China and became a wastrel? Impossible! I hit the white lotus flower bitches into real flowers, got rid of the evil servants, and tortured the scums! By attracting more hotties, I have driven a devil mad: “Girl, you accepted my dowry, don’t even think about flirting with other men behind my back!”  


---

description.fr: C'était une chasseuse de primes dans sa vie antérieure, mais elle s'est réincarnée dans un corps faible. Pas question ! Elle combat les méchants, punit les ordures et botte le cul de ses ennemis. Et accessoirement elle est possédée par un être surnaturel qui lui demande de l'appeler son époux...

description.fr: En poursuivant son rêve, Gu Lin Xi, qui a une double identité de descendante d'un démon de l'épée et de gérante de café, s'éveille progressivement à ses pouvoirs psychiques et déroule une histoire fantastique intrigante avec six hommes d'horizons différents.

description.en:
Cuteness is unbeatable!

Monster Mira is on another rampage, aiming to steal the hero's transformation belt. Having just reached full power thanks to the Doctor's modifications, Mira's new form turns out to be way too cute!

A romantic comedy where justice and evil refuse to back down!
description.vi:
Dễ thương tương đương bất khả chiến bại!

Quái nhân Mira lại tác oai tác quái hòng chiếm đoạt đai biến hình của người hùng. Nhờ việc được Tiến Sĩ cải tiến để tối ưu sức mạnh, Mira đã có được một hình thái mới, và hình thái này cưng vãi ò luôn!

Đón đọc ngay câu chuyện romcom giữa hai thế lực thiện ác chí chóe không ai nhường ai nha!

altTitles.ja: 美味しんぼ

altTitles.en: The Gourmet

description.en:
Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**

Dang Da Lao Cong Hua Qian Kaishi
Starting To Be A Big Boss By Spending Money

description.en: Have you heard of a world of quick transmigration, bound by a prodigal system, where you'll die if you don't spend money? The embarrassing missions involve spending money, taking revenge, and ensuring the well-being of a pretty boy. Chuzheng had no choice but to accept these terms... the system is way too powerful. She can only advise everyone: if you want to become a big boss, start by spending money!
description.fr:
vez-vous entendu parler d'un monde de transmigration rapide, lié par un système de prodigalité, où vous mourrez si vous ne dépensez pas d'argent ? 
Les missions embarrassantes consistent à dépenser de l'argent, à se venger et à assurer le bien-être d'un joli garçon. 
Chu Zheng n'a pas eu d'autre choix que d'accepter ces conditions... le système est bien trop puissant. 
Elle ne peut que conseiller à tout le monde : si vous voulez devenir un big boss, commencez par dépenser de l'argent !

title.en: Class no Bocchi Gal wo Omochikaeri Shite Seisokei Bijin ni Shite Yatta Hanashi

altTitles.ja: クラスのぼっちギャルをお持ち帰りして清楚系美人にしてやった話

altTitles.en: A Story Of Taking Home A Lonely Gal From My Class And Turning Her Into An Elegant Beauty

altTitles.zh: 收留孤身一人的同班辣妹，并使之化身清纯美女

altTitles.zh-ro: Shōuliú gūshēn yīrén de tóngbān làmèi, bìng shǐ zhī huàshēn qīngchún měinǚ

description.en: On a rainy night, Akira Akamori, a high school student about to transfer to a new school, saw his blonde classmate, Aoi Soutome, standing in the park drenched from the rain. “…I don’t have a home anymore.” Though Aoi was a complete stranger to him, Akira couldn’t leave a girl alone, so he took her home. “Thanks for the help.” “I-It’s fine…” When Akira heard about Aoi’s complicated situation, he decided to help her and let her live with him until he transferred to a new school. While confused by their new cohabitation arrangement, the two slowly grew close to each other. It is a love story of two people who repeatedly come together and drift apart, like a spinning record.
description.ja:
来年転校を控えている高校生の明護晃はある雨の日、近所の公園でずぶ濡れになっている金髪ギャルのクラスメイト、五月女葵を見かける。

「……私、帰る家がないの」

どう見てもワケアリの葵を放っておけず、自宅に連れ帰るのだが――

「お風呂、ありがとう」
「お、おう……」

葵の抱える複雑な事情を聞いた晃は人助けだと思い、転校までの間、そのまま一緒に生活をすることに。はじめて尽くしの同居生活に戸惑いながらも、二人はゆっくりと心の距離を近づけていき――。これは、出会いと別れを繰り返す二人の恋物語（ラブストーリー）。
description.pt-br: Uma vez ele ajudou uma garota da sua sala. Em uma tarde chuvosa, Akira Akamori, um colegial que acabou de mudar para uma nova escola, viu sua colega de sala loira, encharcada pela chuva em uma praça por perto. “… eu não tenho mais aonde morar.” Apesar da Aoi ser uma completa estranha para ele, ele não pode deixar a garota sozinha, então a levou para sua casa. “Obrigada pela ajuda.” “E-está tudo bem…”

description.en:
An unknown skill turns into unlimited power with divine knowledge [Internet]!

"To manifest an SSS rank with the weakest skill is a disgrace!"

Rona is a girl who was expelled from her home due to her lack of money, food, and power. Lost and hopeless, she suddenly hears the words...

"Would you like some guidance?"

She discovers how to utilize her unique SSS rank skill: [Internet], which she alone possesses. The true nature of this skill is the ability to access this world's 'guide sites' - an extraordinary cheat skill! Endless production of valuable items! Acquiring ultra-rare equipment! Thanks to her skill, she can do as she pleases...!
description.ja:
「…攻略うぃき？」――最弱クラスのスキルを発現してしまい追放された少女・ローナ。しかしそのスキルの正体は、この世界の『攻略サイト』を見ることができるＳＳＳランクのチートスキル【インターネット】だった！

（１）冒険開始→（２）即・最強武器発見→（３）世界を混乱に陥れる最強少女に‥‥‥。ローナは言う。「私はただ、平和に自由に生きたいだけなのにいぃ‥‥‥！」

description.en: Lin Xing, an ordinary 18-year-old guy, is transported into an otherworldly realm in a fantasy novel. There, he awakens an inexhaustible life force within-an “Immortal Infinite Holy Body.” With help from an array of loyal companions-a coquettish phoenix, an innocent ferret, a fierce panda… Lin Xing sets out to uncover the secrets of this mysterious land.
description.pt-br: Lin Xing, um garoto comum de 18 anos, é transportado para um reino sobrenatural em um romance de fantasia. Lá, ele desperta uma força vital inesgotável em um “Corpo Sagrado Imortal Infinito”. Com a ajuda de uma série de companheiros leais — uma fênix coquete, um furão inocente, um panda feroz… Lin Xing parte para descobrir os segredos desta terra misteriosa.

altTitles.ja: レジェンド

description.en: Reiji Saeki was living in a north-eastern countryside town and lost his life in an accident during summer vacation. But before he knew it, a mysterious ball of light appeared in front of his eyes in a world of whiteness. Being a magician from a parallel world, that ball of light is looking for someone qualified to inherit the magic they had created in order to prevent it from being lost. Reiji, who took on that suggestion, lives in the parallel world Elgin, with a new body and powerful magic.
description.ja: 事故死したはずの高校生・レイの前に姿を現した異世界の魔術師・ゼパイル。その後継者に選ばれたレイは、強力な魔力と伝説級のアイテム、そして相棒の魔獣セトとともに、異世界エルジィンで第二の生を歩み始める！

altTitles.en: Tiger x Dragon! Tora Dora

altTitles.ja: とらドラ！

altTitles.en: Տորադորա՜ [HY]

altTitles.th: ToraDora! ยัยตัวร้ายกับนายหน้าโหด

description.en:
Takasu Ryuuji has learned the hard way that appearances can be deceiving. For despite his inwardly sweet personality, his unintentionally sharp gaze and aggressive features give him the air of a delinquent thug, putting his chances at making new friends, let alone a girlfriend, next to zero.  
  
It's Ryuuji's first day of his second year of high school and it seems as if things are looking up. He gets to sit in between his only friend, Yuusaku, and more importantly, the girl he's secretly crushing on, Kushieda Minori. But just when he thinks the stars are aligned in his favor, he unwittingly crosses the most feared girl in school, Aisaka Taiga, making her into his arch enemy. To top it off, Taiga has moved in right next door to Ryuuji and happens to be Minori's best friend! Can this school year possibly get any worse?!
description.pt-br:
Takasu Ryuuji aprendeu da maneira mais difícil que as aparências podem enganar. Pois, apesar de sua personalidade doce por dentro, seu olhar involuntariamente assustador e características agressivas lhe dão um ar de um delinquente, colocando suas chances de fazer novos amigos e muito menos uma namorada próximas a zero. 

É o primeiro dia do segundo ano do ensino médio de Ryuuji e parece que as coisas estão melhorando. Ele começa a sentar entre o seu único amigo, Yuusaku, e mais importante, a menina que ele está secretamente apaixonado, Kushieda Minori. Mas só quando ele acha que as estrelas estão alinhadas em seu favor, ele involuntariamente arruma encrenca com menina mais temida na escola, Aisaka Taiga, fazendo-a seu arqui-inimigo. Mas confusões acabam juntando os dois já que Taiga mora ao lado do Ryuuji com interesses parecidos os dois se juntam para tentar conquistar seus objetivos! Este ano letivo pode ficar ainda pior!

altTitles.en: Saiyuuki Gaiden
最遊記外伝

description.en: 500 years before the story of Saiyuki, a heretic child with golden eyes is brought into Heaven. He is given into the reluctant care of a minor deity named Konzen, the nephew of the Merciful Goddess Kanzeon Bosatsu. Konzen eventually gives the child the name "Goku". Goku becomes friends with two other minor gods, Marshal Tenpou and General Kenren of the Western Army of Heaven. He also meets a strange little boy who seems to be his own age, the War Prince Nataku. Although Goku is happy in his new home, Heaven is not kind to heretics. There are those who would use Nataku and Goku as tools in an attempt to seize the throne of Heaven, and Konzen, Tenpou, and Kenren may not be able to save them.

Youth Blossom

Children who are beginning their youth.  
Their growing pain on their way to spring.

description.en:
Yotsuya Yuusuke along with his classmates Shindou Iu and Hakozaki Kusue have been transported to a strange and unknown world inhabited by mythological creatures. As soon as they arrive, they meet somebody calling himself the Game Master who then grants them a time-limited quest. To aid them in this quest, he also bestows Shindou and Hakozaki with the roles of a Magician and a Warrior while Yotsuya is randomly granted the role of… a Farmer?!  
This is how a hectic life of adventuring began for three students who now have no choice, but to complete random quests for several phases in the fantasy world if they want to stay alive and protect the real world from the demons and monsters they encounter.

---

**Note: All chapters are now available with official English simulpub from K-Manga!**
